net.adamcin.oakpal.core.ScanListener

    • Uses of ScanListener in net.adamcin.oakpal.core

      Subinterfaces of ScanListener in net.adamcin.oakpal.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ErrorListener
      A single error handler is used during an OakPAL scan.
      interface  PackageCheck
      Primary point of customization for the OakPAL framework.
      Classes in net.adamcin.oakpal.core that implement ScanListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultErrorListener
      Default implementation which reports all exceptions as violations.
      class  ScriptPackageCheck
      The ScriptPackageCheck uses the Invocable interface from JSR223 to listen for scan events and optionally report check violations.
      class  SimplePackageCheck
